text: (Won tun wi pe:) “E ma gbagbo ayafi eni ti o ba tele esin yin.” So pe: “Dajudaju imona (’Islam) ni imona ti Allahu.” (Won tun wi pe:) “(E ma gbagbo) pe won fun eni kan ni iru ohun ti Won fun yin tabi pe won yoo tako yin (ti won yo si jare yin) lodo Oluwa yin.” So pe: “Dajudaju oore ajulo wa ni owo Allahu. O n fun eni ti O ba fe. Allahu ni Olugbaaye, Onimo.”
